articles.description: Explain to patients that research Is continually evolving and the need for booster shots does not mean the vaccinations do not work.
articles.content:
As the global COVID-19 pandemic drags on, Americans are still arguing, debating, and discussing vaccinations.
This is a good time for pharmacists to review the general principles behind the COVID-19… [+6822 chars]
